DoUntil(MonoBehaviour, Func<Boolean>)

Due to framing issues sometimes things don't happen on the frame you want. This function will keep trying each frame until the thing you want done happens.

Its a dirty little hack, so don't over use it

Declaration
public static void DoUntil(this MonoBehaviour monoBehaviour, Func<bool> function)
Parameters
Type Name Description
MonoBehaviour monoBehaviour
Func<System.Boolean> function
